scripts.start: npm run replica && npm run deploy-local && npm run decl && npm run frontends
scripts.frontends: npm run start-registry & npm run start-docs & npm run start-blog & npm run start-cli-releases & npm run start-dao-frontend & npm run start-play-frontend
scripts.decl: npm run decl:cli && npm run decl:frontend
scripts.decl:cli: dfx generate main && dfx generate bench
scripts.deploy-staging: NODE_ENV=production IDENTITY=mops DFX_NETWORK=staging npm run deploy
scripts.deploy-ic: NODE_ENV=production IDENTITY=mops DFX_NETWORK=ic npm run deploy
scripts.deploy:main: NODE_ENV=development IDENTITY=default DFX_NETWORK=local npm run deploy main
scripts.build-cli: npm run prepare-cli && npm run release-cli
scripts.postinstall: (cd frontend && npm install) && (cd cli && npm install) && (cd docs && npm install) && (cd blog && npm install) && (cd cli-releases && npm install)
